attributes.action: Keep Madders at her desk in the downstairs barn
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Don't let them take Madders away! She's an essential calming influence on us in the downstairs barn, and she makes a cracking cup of tea!

She's like yoda! (but more feminine and lovely!)

Save Madders!

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
